output.sentences: The Indians teamates have a lot of fun together.
However, once the game starts they know it's time to get down to business.
Jimmy catches a pass, fakes a pass then makes the first shot.
With the game tied up Rob dribbles around a tough defender and makes the winning shot.
The Indians organization celebrates the win with a team hug.
